EmailTemplate.name: 201810_Global_GoDirect Trade_First Nurture Campaign_JRD.201810_Global_GoDirect T
EmailTemplate.subject: GoDirect Trade: An Entirely New Way For You To Buy and Sell Aerospace Parts
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
My name is Lisa and my team and I have built a revolutionary aerospace marketplace.
If you’re like me and the hundreds of traders I’ve surveyed, you’ve spent the last decade sorting through countless emails and making several phone calls to buy new or used parts.
We’re here to change all that.
GoDirect™ Trade transforms the way you buy and sell parts because EVERY listing includes pricing, product images, quality documents and more.
Say hello to 8130s and goodbye to those mysterious sellers who claim to have “the goods.”
You see, we didn't just create another website so that you can collect another login and buy online… We’ve revolutionized the industry, one listing at a time.
We’re looking for buyers and sellers to join us on our journey to become the greatest aerospace marketplace to ever exist. Create your account and start shopping on GoDirect Trade today.
CREATE YOUR ACCOUNT <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=18_godirecttrade]]>
